## Setup

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| message: false
# Load libraries & data -------------------------------------
library(dplyr)
library(gtsummary)

adsl <- random.cdisc.data::cadsl
adae <- random.cdisc.data::cadae

# Pre-processing --------------------------------------------

adae <- adae %>%
  dplyr::filter(
    # safety population
    SAFFL == "Y", 
    # serious adverse events
    AESER == "Y"
  )

```


## Build Table

```{r}
#| label: tbl
#| output: false
tbl <- adae |>
  tbl_hierarchical(
    variables = c(AESOC, AEDECOD),
    by = ARM,
    id = USUBJID,
    denominator = adsl,
    overall_row = TRUE,
    label = "..ard_hierarchical_overall.." ~ "Any SAE"
  )
tbl
```

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| include: false
## ** (OPTIONAL) RUN THIS CHUNK LOCALLY TO GENERATE AN IMAGE FILE **
gt::gtsave(as_gt(tbl), filename = "result.png")
```

```{r}
#| label: img
#| echo: false
#| fig-align: center

```

## Build ARD

```{r}
#| label: ard
#| echo: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| output: false
ard <- gather_ard(tbl)

ard
```
